name: Correcting Cream Veil Set
about: What it is:A set that makes for the perfect ornaments with a Le Serum and a cute Correcting Cream Veilu2014the perfect gifts for the beauty lovers in your life..Skin Type:Normal and Dry.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Skin-Empowering Illuminator: Defends skin against internal and external stressors..What Else You Need to Know:This set immediately diffuses the appearance of dullness and corrects skinu2019s visible imperfections. It amplifies your foundation finish for long-lasting wear that resists oiliness and creasing. It hydrates and visibly smooths fine lines and dry areas..This Set Contains:- 1.25 oz/ 37 mL Correcting Cream Veil
ingredients: -Skin-Empowering Illuminator: Defends skin against internal and external stressors..-Hyaluronic Acid: Provides moisturizing benefits and enhances suppleness..-Kelplex: Activates skinu2019s regenerative powers and supports smoother-looking skin....Correcting Cream Veil:.Water (Aqua/Eau),Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Isohexadecane, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Titanium Dioxide (Nano), Nylon-12, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Triisostearin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Silica, Erythritol, Xylitol, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Triethanolamine, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isostearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Stearic Acid, Disodium Edta, Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Trehalose, Bht, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Polysilicone-2, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopherol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Sodium Citrate, Mica, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Barium Sulfate, Theanine, Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Glycine, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Citric Acid, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Rosa Roxburghii Fruit Extract, Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Silk, Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein, Perilla Ocymoides Leaf Extract.....Le Serum:.Water(Aqua/Eau), Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Dipropylene Glycol , Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether,Betaine, Glycerin, Trehalose, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Sodium Citrate, Ppg-13-Decyltetradeceth-24, Citric Acid, Erythritol, Fructose, Xanthan Gum, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Allantoin, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium Edta, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Tremella Fuciformis Polysaccharide, Potassium Hydroxide, Saccharomyces Ferment Lysate Filtrate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Lilium Candidum Bulb Extract, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Extract, Limonene, Linalool, Theanine, Hydrolyzed Silk, Disodium Adenosine Triphosphate, Inositol, Potentilla Erecta Root Extract, Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract, Polyquaternium-51, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Conchiolin Protein.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-First, use your favorite Cle de Peau cleanser (sold separately), followed with the Le Serum all over your face..-Next, squeeze a small amount of the Correcting Cream Veil onto your fingertips and apply to five points (forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks) on your face..-Smooth evenly over your skin and allow the base to set before applying foundation.
